Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oops. Sorry. <sp:5:0:0>Didn't mean to waste your
time with dumb gossip.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'd better get back to work. Take it easy.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>My little sister, Gleema, won't stop talking
about that so-called <clr:0000>Cucco oracle <clr:ffff>on the
hill behind the stable.
I don't buy it, personally. There's no way
a Cucco can talk.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>Why is everybody so quick to believe the
silliest things?
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you been to any other stables?


<sp:3:0:2:0501>There's talk going from stable to stable
about some <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>. We hung
up a picture of it. See?
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Ever since you told me there was some
truth about that beast, I've understood a
little about why rumors spread so easily.
Still, I wish people wouldn't get quite so
absorbed in them.
WakkaCharm: I have a ring garland too!
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's so rainy in the <clr:0000>south of Hyrule<clr:ffff>, you
can hardly make anything out anyway.

Pffft! That must be how <clr:0000>rumors started
about this beast<clr:ffff>! Someone was probably
looking at a rock or tree or something.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>I just don't understand why everybody
loves rumors and superstition so much.

My rule is never to put stock in something
I haven't seen with my own two eyes.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Work_00>What?<sp:5:0:0> You mean...<sp:5:1:0> You've actually seen
what's behind all the rumors about
that beast?<sp:5:1:0>
Geez.<sp:5:0:0> From the look in your eyes, it
seems like you're telling the truth.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I thought it was all made up, but I'm kinda
happy to find out these animals are out
there somewhere.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now the world feels a little...<sp:5:0:0>bigger.<sp:5:0:0>
Thanks for telling me.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are <clr:0000>lots of rumors floating around<clr:ffff>
at stables. Be careful what you believe.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>But since you go around the world seeing
the truth with your own eyes, I guess
you're probably fine.
Talk04: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>It's late. Why don't you stay here tonight?
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>There's this rumor going around about a
<clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff> appearing at East Akkala Stable
to the northeast.
They say it can revive dead horses. <sp:5:0:0>Pffft!
Talk06: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Hi. Too bad about this weather, huh?
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>You're the one who brought a picture
of the Unity Bell, right?

Honestly, I have zero interest in all this
stuff about connections.

But my little sisters seem to like it, and
that makes me happy. So thanks.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Why don't you rest here until the rain
lets up?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hm? Oh, hello. <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to South
Akkala Stable.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Sorry. I was lost in thought there.<sp:5:0:0>


I was wondering why so many people
are SO interested in that.

That <clr:0000>beast is the stuff of rumors<clr:ffff> and is
apparently found in the south.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>A huge, tusked creature...<sp:5:0:0> Pffft!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's gotta be made up, right?


Nobody in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>'s even seen its
footprints, let alone the thing itself.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I mean, nobody in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>'s ever seen
the thing, not even its footprints.
